titleStmt.title: Several proposals for peace & freedom, by an agreement of the people, offered unto Commissary General Ireton for the concurrence of the Army, by the approbation and consent of many worthy persons of the Common Councel and others of the city of London, on the eleventh of this instant December, to be agreed unto, and subscribed by all the inhabitants of England & VVales.
titleStmt.author: Jubbes, John.
Ireton, Henry, 1611-1651.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
